description: This sweet-tasting bourbon whiskey has its own way in making a drink special. With its fancy maple flavor, it will surely enhance every spirit it mixes with. Try this recipe and it might just bring out the sweet side in you.
keywords: how to make jim beam maple hummer
name: Jim Beam Maple Hummer

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, put Kahlua, bourbon, dark rum, chia mix, nutmeg, and cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, put Kahlua, bourbon, dark rum, chia mix, nutmeg, and cinnamon.

recipeInstructions.name: Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream.
recipeInstructions.text: Add two scoops of vanilla ice cream.

recipeInstructions.name: Blend it well. Transfer to a tall glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Blend it well. Transfer to a tall glass.
